text: @realDonaldTrump When historians write about Donald Trump's presidency, his impeachment will be the second most important item. His abject failure in dealing with the challenge of the coronavirus, his complicity in the scope of its death and destruction, will be the first. https://t.co/YUNQ9r7No2
